amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Amtrak by $34 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Operating Grants to the National Railroad Passenger Corporation by $34 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 154 - 248 (Roll no. 273).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 154 - 248 (Roll no. 273).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
